column4: hi guys...can anyone tell me how i upgrade 2.6.22-12-generic to 2.6.22-14-generic
can you tell me how i do that?
pardon me but im not yet very familiar with these...
System>Administration>Synaptic use search to find the package (linux-image-<version>) and remove it
i currently see linux-image-2.6.22.12-generic..is this what i need to remove?
use synaptic to install the newer kernel or better yet install linux-image-generic
it should install the latest kernel (2.6.22-14-generic if i understandyou )
thats my problema actually...because im still using the 2.6.22.12 version
